title: Lab 03: Exposing Your Application
description: In this lab, we will deploy a sample application to a Kubernetes cluster. The application will be automatically exposed using NodePort. NodePort is a simple way to make your application accessible from outside the Kubernetes cluster. It is primarily used for testing purposes and is not recommended for production environments.
